snippet: The Washington Monument reopened after nearly three years of repairs to undo the damage caused by an earthquake in 2011.
abstract: Washington Monument reopens after nearly three years of repairs to undo the damage caused by an earthquake in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Monument reopened after nearly three years of repairs to undo the damage caused by an earthquake in 2011.

headline.main: Healed, Landmark Again Beckons: Come On Up. The View Is Terrific.
headline.print_headline: Healed, Landmark Again Beckons: Come On Up. The View Is Terrific.
